item.title: about me
item.dc:creator: pixelwars
item.content:encoded:
[row] [column width_md="8"] [section_title icon="icon-guest" text="A LITTLE ABOUT ME"] [intro] Hello. I am [rotate_words titles="an illustrator.,a writer.,a freelancer.,an inventor.,a wordpress fan.,a coffee lover."] I live in a small town somewhere in the world. I am passionated about minimalistic and flat design. [/intro] [/column] [column width_md="4"] [section_title icon="icon-twitter" text="LATEST TWEETS"] [latest_tweets count="1" id="388393979672150017"] [/column] [/row] [section_title icon="fa-magic" text="SERVICES"] [row] [column width="6" width_md="3"] [service color="color1" icon="fa-html5"]

WEB DESIGN

I design super cool websites. It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content. [/service] [/column] [column width="6" width_md="3"] [service color="color2" icon="fa-font"]

TYPE DESIGN

I can design beautiful type faces for both digital and print media. It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted. [/service] [/column] [column width="6" width_md="3"] [service color="color3" icon="icon-smashmag"]

BLOG WRITER

I write about web design. It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content. [/service] [/column] [column width="6" width_md="3"] [service color="color4" icon="fa-rocket"]

PROJECT MANAGEMENT

I have strong project management skills. It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content. item.title: contact
item.dc:creator: pixelwars
item.content:encoded:

[section_title icon="icon-address-book" text="LET'S GET IN TOUCH"]
[letter title="Johhny Alexander Doe" email="johhny@gmail.com" telephone="123 456 78 99" address="121 King Street, Melbourne Victoria 3000 Australia" image_url="http://themes.pixelwars.org/cvcard-wp/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/stamp-image.png"]

item.title: resume
item.dc:creator: pixelwars
item.content:encoded:
[row] [column width_md="6"] [timeline title="WORK HISTORY" icon="fa-flask"] [event date="2012" current="yes"]

Front End Web Developer

PIXELWARS INC.
I currently work for Pixelwars creative studio. I create usable web interfaces, front end coding stuff and almost anything. But i love what i do. [/event] [event date="2010" current=""]

Web Developer

GOOGLE INC.
I worked as a Web Developer at Google for 3 years. I create usable web interfaces, front end coding stuff and almost anything. But i love what i do. [/event] [event date="2006" current=""]

Exclusive Author

ENVATO INC.
I am an Elite Author at Envato. I create usable web interfaces, front end coding stuff and almost anything. But i love what i do. [/event] [/timeline] [timeline title="EDUCATION HISTORY" icon="icon-college"] [event date="2012" current=""]

Atom Science

STANFORD UNIVERSITY
I studied atomic stuff at Stanford University. I create usable web interfaces, front end coding stuff and almost anything. But i love what i do. [/event] [event date="2010" current=""]

Software Engineering

HARVARD UNIVERSITY
I got my Master Degree at Harvard University. I create usable web interfaces, front end coding stuff and almost anything. But i love what i do. [/event] [event date="2006" current=""]

Computer Science

MIT
I studied Computer Science at MIT. I create usable web interfaces, front end coding stuff and almost anything. But i love what i do. [/event] [/timeline] [/column] [column width_md="6"] [section_title icon="icon-cog-1" text="DEVELOPMENT SKILLS"] [progress_bar first_bar="yes" last_bar="" text="HTML5" percent="100"] [progress_bar first_bar="" last_bar="" text="CSS3" percent="50"] [progress_bar first_bar="" last_bar="" text="jQuery" percent="70"] [progress_bar first_bar="" last_bar="yes" text="Wordpress" percent="100"] [section_title icon="icon-brush" text="DESIGN SKILLS"] [progress_bar first_bar="yes" last_bar="" text="FIREWORKS" percent="90"] [progress_bar first_bar="" last_bar="" text="PHOTOSHOP" percent="60"] [progress_bar first_bar="" last_bar="yes" text="ILLUSTRATOR" percent="40"] [section_title icon="icon-comment" text="TESTIMONIALS"] [testimonial first="yes" last="" name="PHILLIP AUSTIN" job="CEO / GRAVITY INC." image="http://themes.pixelwars.org/cvcard-wp/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/testo-01.jpg"]He is a great and hardworking guy. I am so proud of i have him as my asistant. He helped me so much. Also he is a great and hardworking guy. I am so proud of i have him as my asistant. He helped me so much.[/testimonial] [testimonial first="" last="" name="GARY MORGAN" job="CHEMIST / FREELANCER" image="http://themes.pixelwars.org/cvcard-wp/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/testo-02.jpg"]He was a great co-worker and a friend. I would't be where i am without his support.[/testimonial] [testimonial first="" last="yes" name="JASON WILSON" job="LAB GEEK / MIAMI METRO" image="http://themes.pixelwars.org/cvcard-wp/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/testo-03.jpg"]He is ok.[/testimonial] [section_title icon="icon-doc-alt" text="DOWNLOAD MY CV"] You can download my CV in pdf format if you like. I currently work for Pixelwars creative studio. I create usable web interfaces, front end coding stuff and almost anything. But i love what i do. [button text="DOWNLOAD CV" new_tab="" size=""Â icon="" color="primary" colored="" url="#"]   [section_title icon="icon-linkedin" text="VIEW MY LINKEDIN PROFILE"] You can view my LinkedIn profile. I currently work for Pixelwars creative studio. I create usable web interfaces, front end coding stuff and almost anything. But i love what i do. [button text="MY LINKEDIN PROFILE" new_tab="" size=""Â icon="" color="primary" colored="" url="#"] [/column] [/row]

item.title: SHORTCODES

item.content:encoded:
[row] [column width_md="6"]

TABS

[tabs_wrap titles="DESIGN,CODE"] [tab_pane]There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text.[/tab_pane][tab_pane]It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text.[/tab_pane] [/tabs_wrap] [/column] [column width_md="6"]

TOGGLES

ACCORDION

LIGHTBOX

[row] [column width="6" width_md="3"] [inline_lightbox_wrap type="image" thumbnail="http://themes.pixelwars.org/cvcard-wp/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/041.png"][inline_lightbox_image first_item="yes" gallery="01" title="Animal with love" url="http://themes.pixelwars.org/cvcard-wp/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/lightbox-011.jpg"][/inline_lightbox_wrap] [/column] [column width="6" width_md="3"] [inline_lightbox_wrap type="image" thumbnail="http://themes.pixelwars.org/cvcard-wp/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/011.png"][inline_lightbox_image first_item="yes" gallery="02" title="Octopus is dangerous!" url="http://themes.pixelwars.org/cvcard-wp/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/lightbox-021.jpg"][inline_lightbox_image first_item="" gallery="02" title="" url="http://themes.pixelwars.org/cvcard-wp/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/lightbox-041.jpg"][inline_lightbox_image first_item="" gallery="02" title="Dog have dreams" url="http://themes.pixelwars.org/cvcard-wp/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/lightbox-031.jpg"][/inline_lightbox_wrap] [/column] [column width="6" width_md="3"] [inline_lightbox_wrap type="video" thumbnail="http://themes.pixelwars.org/cvcard-wp/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/021.png"][inline_lightbox_iframe first_item="yes" gallery="03" title="Paper by FiftyThree" src="http://player.vimeo.com/video/37254322?badge=0&color=ffffff"][/inline_lightbox_wrap] [/column] [column width="6" width_md="3"] [inline_lightbox_wrap type="audio" thumbnail="http://themes.pixelwars.org/cvcard-wp/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/031.png"][inline_lightbox_iframe first_item="yes" gallery="04" title="Soundcloud embed" src="http://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F207988&"][/inline_lightbox_wrap] [/column] [/row]

ALERTS

[row] [column width="6"] [alert title="NOTE:"]This is a standart alert message.[/alert][alert type="info" title="NOTE:"]This is an info alert message.[/alert] [/column] [column width="6"] [alert type="success"Â title="NOTE:"]This is a success alert message.[/alert][alert type="error" title="NOTE:"]This is an error alert message.[/alert] [/column] [/row]

CALL TO ACTION

[call_to_action] [row] [column width="8"]

cvCard is a clean and beautiful wordpress theme!

What are you waiting for? Buy now and begin to blogging. [/column] [column width="4"] [cta_button_wrap] [button text="BUY NOW" size="big" icon="icon-cart" url="#"] [/cta_button_wrap] [/column] [/row] [/call_to_action]

Project Actions

[project_action] [button text="DOWNLOAD" size="big"Â icon="fa-cloud-download" colored="yes"Â color="blue"Â url="#"][button text="PREVIEW" size="big"Â icon="fa-eye" colored="yes"Â color="green"Â url="#"][button text="GITHUB" size="big"Â icon="fa-github" colored="yes"Â color="red"Â url="#"] [/project_action]

Buttons

Minimal Buttons

[button text="Button" url="#"][button text="Button" color="red" url="#"][button text="Button" color="green" url="#"][button text="Button" color="blue" url="#"][button text="Button" color="yellow" url="#"]

Colored Buttons

Buttons Sizes and Button with icons

[button text="SMALL" size="small" url="#"][button text="MEDIUM" url="#"][button text="BIG" size="big" url="#"][button text="LIKE" size="big" color="blue" colored="yes" icon="fa-thumbs-up" url="#"][button text="AWARDS" size="big" color="yellow" icon="fa-trophy" url="#"]

Pre, Code Blocks

This is an inline code blockÂ [code_line]index.html[/code_line]Â is the main file.

Default

[code_block] <meta charset="utf-8" /> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1"> <meta name="description" content="impressiVcard - impressiVCard Responsive HTML5 VCard Template"> <meta name="keywords" content="impressivcard, vcard, html5, ,portfolio"> <meta name="author" content="Pixelwars"> <title>ImpressivCard</title> [/code_block]

Google Syntax Prettify

[code_block_prettify] <meta charset="utf-8" /> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1"> <meta name="description" content="impressiVcard - impressiVCard Responsive HTML5 VCard Template"> <meta name="keywords" content="impressivcard, vcard, html5, ,portfolio"> <meta name="author" content="Pixelwars"> <title>ImpressivCard</title> [/code_block_prettify]

Google Syntax Prettify with Line Numbers

[code_block_line_numbers] /* TYPOGRAPHY */ h1 { font-size: 2.20em; margin: 0.8em 0 0.4em 0; } h2 { font-size: 1.60em; margin: 1.4em 0 0.8em 0; } h3 { font-size: 1.20em; margin: 1.0em 0; } h4 { font-size: 0.90em; margin: 1.0em 0; } h5 { font-size: 0.90em; margin: 1.0em 0 .8em 0; } h6 { font-size: 0.85em; margin: 1.0em 0 .8em 0; } [/code_block_line_numbers]
